articles.title: HP’s new 49-inch curved ultrawide monitor has a pop-up webcam - The Verge
articles.description: The HP Series 5 Pro 49-inch Conferencing Monitor is a massive monitor for office work.

articles.title: GameStop Says It Will Continue to Sell Xbox Game Pass Ultimate for $19.99 a Month Despite New Price Hike - IGN
articles.description: GameStop has announced that it will continue to sell Game Pass Ultimate at the pre-hike price of $19.99 per month, both in-store and online. However, it's not the only retailer doing so.

articles.title: Meta Ray-Ban Display Sells Out As Early Adopters Struggle To Buy - UploadVR
articles.description:
Meta Ray-Ban Display is now sold out in almost every store it was available in.

Restocks are "coming", Meta says, and the company is doubling the number of stores offering the glasses.

articles.title: Black Ops 7 Multiplayer Avoids The CoD Fatigue, But Warzone Falls A Step Back - GameSpot
articles.description: The futuristic multiplayer setting reduces any Black Ops fatigue, but Warzone's integration feels like an afterthought.

articles.title: Super Mario Bros.: The Lost Levels Minus World levels found four decades later - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: It’s been about four decades since Super Mario Bros.: The Lost Levels launched, but one fan has now managed to uncover new Minus World levels. Dedicated Nintendo fans are very likely aware of the Minus World glitch. By having Mario move a certain way in Super…

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A Has Apparently Leaked, Beware Of Spoilers - Kotaku
articles.description: If you’ve been avoiding spoilers this past year, you might want to keep your head down
